article.title: Honeywell to Provide Aircraft Displays
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Honeywell International Incorporated, Defense & Space Electronic Systems, Albuquerque, New Mexico, is being awarded an $8 million contract modification for the procurement of 131 advanced multi-purpose displays (68 5x5 forward displays; 42 5x5 aft displays; and 21 8x10 displays) for Lot 35 F/A-18F and EA-18G aircraft. The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
